Detailed Description

Defines a range of plot data.

BOOL CPTPlotRange::contains: ( NSDecimal  number) [virtual]

Determines whether a given number is inside the range.

Parameters:
numberThe number to check.
Returns:
True if location ≤ number ≤ end.
BOOL CPTPlotRange::containsDouble: ( double  number) [virtual]

Determines whether a given number is inside the range.

Parameters:
numberThe number to check.
Returns:
True if location ≤ number ≤ end.
void CPTPlotRange::expandRangeByFactor: ( NSDecimal  factor) [virtual]

Extends/contracts the range by a factor.

Parameters:
factorFactor used. A value of 1.0 gives no change. Less than 1.0 is a contraction, and greater than 1.0 is expansion.
id CPTPlotRange::initWithLocation:length: ( NSDecimal  loc,
[length] NSDecimal  len 
) [virtual]

Initializes a newly allocated CPTPlotRange object with the provided location and length.

Parameters:
locThe starting location of the range.
lenThe length of the range.
Returns:
The initialized CPTPlotRange object.
void CPTPlotRange::intersectionPlotRange: ( CPTPlotRange *  other) [virtual]

Sets the messaged object to the intersection with another range. The sign of length is unchanged.

Parameters:
otherThe other plot range.
BOOL CPTPlotRange::isEqualToRange: ( CPTPlotRange *  otherRange) [virtual]

Determines whether a given range is equal to the range of the receiver.

Parameters:
otherRangeThe range to check.
Returns:
True if the ranges both have the same location and length.
CPTPlotRange * CPTPlotRange::plotRangeWithLocation:length: ( NSDecimal  loc,
[length] NSDecimal  len 
) [static, virtual]

lenThe length of the range.
Returns:

void CPTPlotRange::shiftEndToFitInRange: ( CPTPlotRange *  otherRange) [virtual]

Moves the whole range so that the end point fits in other range.

Parameters:
otherRangeOther range. The minimum possible shift is made. The range length is unchanged.
void CPTPlotRange::shiftLocationToFitInRange: ( CPTPlotRange *  otherRange) [virtual]

Moves the whole range so that the location fits in other range.

Parameters:
otherRangeOther range. The minimum possible shift is made. The range length is unchanged.
void CPTPlotRange::unionPlotRange: ( CPTPlotRange *  other) [virtual]

Extends the range to include another range. The sign of length is unchanged.

Parameters:
otherThe other plot range.
